channel.title: ShowyEdge Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 3.5.0
item.description:
About v3.5.0 Update

  • ✨ New Features
    • Dark Mode has been supported.
    • Set transparency (20%) forcely if the indicator size is larger than the menu bar height in order to avoid the indicator hides all windows.
  • ⚡️ Improvements
    • Sparkle Framework has been updated.

ShowyEdge WebSite
